name: islhp2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, c4), wbr(c2, c5, c6)))

stmt.origin: baibd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, c4), wbr(c2, c5, c6))
stmt.pretty: baibd(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c4, c2[c5]c6)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, c4), wbr(c2, c5, c6)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, c4), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wbr(c2, c5, c6))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, c4), wbr(c2, c5, c6)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, c4), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wbr(c2, c5, c6))))

stmt.origin: islhp(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, c5, c6)
stmt.pretty: islhp(c0, c1, c2, c4, c3, c5, c6)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, c4), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wbr(c2, c5, c6))))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(cp1, c0))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(ccvr, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(clh, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c2, c4), wbr(c2, c5, c6)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c6, cfv(cp1, c0))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(ccvr, c0))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(clh, c0))

comment: The predicate "is a co-atom (lattice hyperplane)". (Contributed by NM, 18-May-2012.)
